title: Noam Chomsky on Propaganda - The Big Idea - Interview with Andrew Marr
description:
"The Big Idea" - a half hour interview between Noam Chomsky and British journalist Andrew Marr, first aired by the BBC in February 1996. 

2014-11-18: English subtitles added.

If you're interested in more recent examples of propaganda in the British media, please see https://www.medialens.org


#mediabias​ #chomsky​ #propaganda #manufacturingconsent
